Package com.github.tadukoo.database.mysql.syntax.statement

Class SQLStatement.SQLStatementBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.github.tadukoo.database.mysql.syntax.statement.SQLStatement.SQLStatementBuilder
Enclosing class:
SQLStatement
public static class SQLStatement.SQLStatementBuilder extends Object
A builder class used to start building a SQL Statement. The following options are available:
SQL Statement Types
Type Class
select SQLSelectStatement
insert SQLInsertStatement
update SQLUpdateStatement
delete SQLDeleteStatement
create SQLCreateStatement
drop SQLDropStatement
alter SQLAlterStatement
Version:
Alpha v.0.3
Author:
Logan Ferree (Tadukoo)
